meanings.definition: A person who stays at a hostel.
meanings.sent1: The hostellers gathered in the common room to plan their day.
meanings.sent2: The hostellers checked in at the reception desk before heading to their rooms.
meanings.sent3: The hostellers joked about having a 'hostel Olympics' to see who could make their bed the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The hostellers were like bees buzzing around the hive, each with their own unique energy.
meanings.sent5: The image of the hostellers chatting and laughing in the courtyard stayed with me long after I left the hostel.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of hostellers exploring the city together.
meanings.sent2: The hostellers' backpacks were lined up neatly in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The hostellers formed a human chain to pass their luggage up the stairs, much to the amusement of other guests.
meanings.sent4: The hostellers moved through the hostel like a colorful parade, each bringing their own stories and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the hostellers echoed through the corridors, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
